definition: a division of a prison (usually consisting of several cells), watch over or shield from danger or harm
details:
noun
- a division of a prison (usually consisting of several cells)
= synonyms: cellblock
- block forming a division of a hospital or a suite of rooms shared by patients who need a similar kind of care
= example: block forming a division of a hospital or a suite of rooms shared by patients who need a similar kind of care
= synonyms: hospital ward
- a district into which a city or town is divided for the purpose of administration and elections
- a person who is under the protection or in the custody of another
verb
- watch over or shield from danger or harm
= synonyms: guard
